# HUD::SET_FLOATING_HELP_TEXT_SCREEN_POSITION

## Summary
Sets the floating help text position on screen

## Parameters
* **eHELP_TEXT_FLOATING_ID** id
* **FLOAT** posX
* **FLOAT** posY
